title: Bug 28967[Editor Mgmt] no close button on last editor when editors dropdown is active
description: Bug 28967[Editor Mgmt] no close button on last editor when editors dropdown is active
OB: When a considerable number of editors are open, so that the leftrightnavigator appears, and the editors dropdown is active (through the WindowPreferencesEditors), then for the last visible editor, the close button doesnot appear when the mouse is moved over the editor tab.
